pokemon-api.name: Pokemon API
pokemon-api.description: Comprehensive Pokemon API providing detailed data on Pokemon, moves, abilities, types, and more from all generations of the Pokemon universe. Perfect for building Pokemon-related applications, games, and websites.

features.title: Complete Pokemon Data
features.description: Access detailed information about all Pokemon including stats, types, abilities, moves, and evolution chains.

features.title: Move Database
features.description: Comprehensive move data including power, accuracy, type, and effect descriptions for all Pokemon moves.

features.title: Type System
features.description: Complete type effectiveness data and relationships between different Pokemon types.

features.title: Generation Support
features.description: Data from all Pokemon generations including the latest games and regions.

features.title: RESTful API
features.description: Clean, RESTful API design with consistent endpoints and JSON responses.

features.title: No Authentication
features.description: Free to use with no API key required, making it perfect for development and learning.

useCases.title: Pokemon Games
useCases.description: Build Pokemon-themed games with accurate data for moves, types, and battle mechanics.

useCases.title: Educational Apps
useCases.description: Create learning applications that teach about Pokemon types, evolution, and characteristics.

useCases.title: Data Analysis
useCases.description: Analyze Pokemon statistics, type distributions, and competitive meta data.

useCases.title: Fan Websites
useCases.description: Build comprehensive Pokemon fan sites with detailed information and search functionality.

steam-api.name: Steam API
steam-api.description: Access Steam's comprehensive API for game data, user profiles, achievements, and store information. Perfect for building gaming applications, Steam integration, and game discovery platforms.

features.title: Game Data
features.description: Access comprehensive game information including details, screenshots, videos, and system requirements.

features.title: User Profiles
features.description: Get user profile information, game libraries, playtime statistics, and friend lists.

features.title: Achievements
features.description: Access achievement data, completion rates, and user achievement progress.

features.title: Store Data
features.description: Get pricing information, discounts, reviews, and store page data for games.

features.title: News & Updates
features.description: Access game news, updates, and community announcements.

features.title: Steam Workshop
features.description: Access mod data, workshop items, and community-created content.

useCases.title: Gaming Communities
useCases.description: Build communities around games with user profiles, achievements, and game libraries.

useCases.title: Game Discovery
useCases.description: Create platforms for discovering new games based on user preferences and playtime.

useCases.title: Analytics Platforms
useCases.description: Analyze gaming trends, popular games, and user behavior patterns.

useCases.title: Achievement Tracking
useCases.description: Build applications to track and display user achievements across multiple games.

twitter-api.name: Twitter API
twitter-api.description: Access Twitter's official API to post tweets, read timelines, manage followers, and integrate Twitter functionality into your applications.

features.title: Tweet Management
features.description: Post tweets, read timelines, and manage tweet content programmatically.

features.title: User Data
features.description: Access user profiles, followers, following lists, and user statistics.

features.title: Search & Trends
features.description: Search tweets, track trending topics, and analyze social media conversations.

features.title: Direct Messages
features.description: Send and receive direct messages, manage conversations, and automate responses.

features.title: Media Upload
features.description: Upload images, videos, and other media content to Twitter.

features.title: Webhooks
features.description: Receive real-time notifications for mentions, follows, and other events.

useCases.title: Social Media Management
useCases.description: Build tools to manage multiple Twitter accounts, schedule posts, and track engagement.

useCases.title: Analytics Dashboard
useCases.description: Create dashboards to analyze tweet performance, follower growth, and engagement metrics.

useCases.title: Customer Service
useCases.description: Integrate Twitter for customer support, automated responses, and issue tracking.

useCases.title: Content Aggregation
useCases.description: Aggregate and display Twitter content from multiple sources for news and social feeds.

openweathermap.name: OpenWeatherMap API
openweathermap.description: Comprehensive weather data API providing current conditions, forecasts, and historical weather data. Perfect for building weather applications, data analysis, and location-based services.

features.title: Current Weather
features.description: Get real-time weather conditions including temperature, humidity, wind speed, and atmospheric pressure.

features.title: Weather Forecasts
features.description: Access 5-day and 16-day weather forecasts with detailed hourly predictions.

features.title: Historical Data
features.description: Retrieve historical weather data for climate analysis and trend studies.

features.title: Weather Alerts
features.description: Get severe weather alerts and warnings for specific locations.

features.title: Multiple Locations
features.description: Query weather data for multiple cities simultaneously with bulk requests.

features.title: Weather Maps
features.description: Access weather map layers for precipitation, temperature, and other meteorological data.

useCases.title: Weather Apps
useCases.description: Build mobile and web applications that display current weather and forecasts.

useCases.title: Agriculture
useCases.description: Help farmers make informed decisions based on weather forecasts and historical data.

useCases.title: Travel Planning
useCases.description: Integrate weather data into travel applications for better trip planning.

useCases.title: Climate Research
useCases.description: Access historical weather data for climate analysis and research projects.

zelda-api.name: Zelda API
zelda-api.description: Comprehensive API for The Legend of Zelda universe, including characters, items, and quests from all games in the series.

features.title: Character Database
features.description: Access detailed information about Zelda characters, their roles, and appearances across games.

features.title: Item Collection
features.description: Comprehensive database of weapons, tools, and items from the Zelda universe.

features.title: Game Data
features.description: Information about all Zelda games, their stories, and gameplay mechanics.

features.title: Quest Information
features.description: Details about quests, dungeons, and storylines from various Zelda games.

useCases.title: Fan Websites
useCases.description: Build comprehensive Zelda fan sites with character and item databases.

useCases.title: Gaming Guides
useCases.description: Create walkthroughs and guides using detailed game and quest information.

useCases.title: Educational Content
useCases.description: Build educational applications about Zelda lore and game history.

marvel-api.name: Marvel API
marvel-api.description: Access Marvel's comprehensive API for character data, comics, stories, and events from the Marvel Universe.

features.title: Character Database
features.description: Access detailed information about Marvel characters including powers, appearances, and storylines.

features.title: Comic Archives
features.description: Browse Marvel's extensive comic collection with covers, creators, and publication details.

features.title: Story Events
features.description: Access major Marvel storylines, events, and crossovers with character participation data.

features.title: Creator Information
features.description: Get details about writers, artists, and other creators who worked on Marvel content.

useCases.title: Fan Applications
useCases.description: Build Marvel fan sites, character databases, and comic collection trackers.

useCases.title: Educational Tools
useCases.description: Create educational applications about Marvel history, characters, and storylines.

minecraft-api.name: Minecraft API
minecraft-api.description: Access Minecraft server data, player statistics, and game information through various Minecraft APIs.

features.title: Server Status
features.description: Check server status, player count, and server information in real-time.

features.title: Player Data
features.description: Access player statistics, achievements, and gameplay data.

features.title: Skin API
features.description: Retrieve player skins, capes, and avatar information.

features.title: UUID Resolution
features.description: Convert between usernames and UUIDs for player identification.

useCases.title: Server Management
useCases.description: Build tools to monitor server status, player activity, and server performance.

useCases.title: Player Tracking
useCases.description: Create applications to track player statistics, achievements, and gameplay history.

instagram-api.name: Instagram Basic Display API
instagram-api.description: Access Instagram's Basic Display API for user profile information, media content, and Instagram integration.

features.title: User Profile Data
features.description: Access user profile information including username, account type, and media count.

features.title: Media Content
features.description: Retrieve user's media including photos and videos with captions and metadata.

features.title: OAuth Integration
features.description: Secure authentication flow for accessing user data with proper permissions.

features.title: Media Insights
features.description: Get basic insights and engagement data for user's media content.

useCases.title: Content Management
useCases.description: Build systems to manage and display Instagram content on websites and applications.

useCases.title: Social Media Analytics
useCases.description: Create analytics dashboards to track Instagram performance and engagement.

facebook-api.name: Facebook Graph API
facebook-api.description: Access Facebook's comprehensive Graph API for social media integration, user data, page management, and content sharing.

features.title: User Data
features.description: Access user profile information, friends, and social connections with proper permissions.

features.title: Page Management
features.description: Manage Facebook pages, post content, and interact with page followers.

features.title: Content Sharing
features.description: Share content to user timelines, pages, and groups programmatically.

features.title: Analytics
features.description: Access page insights, post analytics, and audience demographics.

useCases.title: Social Login
useCases.description: Implement Facebook login for easy user authentication and registration.

useCases.title: Content Management
useCases.description: Build tools to manage and schedule Facebook page content and posts.

weather-api.description: Comprehensive weather API providing current conditions, forecasts, and historical weather data.

features.title: Current Weather
features.description: Get real-time weather conditions including temperature, humidity, wind speed, and atmospheric pressure.

features.title: Weather Forecasts
features.description: Access 5-day and 16-day weather forecasts with detailed hourly predictions.

features.title: Historical Data
features.description: Retrieve historical weather data for climate analysis and trend studies.

features.title: Weather Alerts
features.description: Get severe weather alerts and warnings for specific locations.

useCases.description: Build mobile and web applications that display current weather and forecasts.
